definition: to receive/to accept/to collect/to put away/to restrain/to stop/in care of (used on address line after name)
to gather/to collect/collected works/classifier for sections of a TV series etc: episode

sentences.english: The garbage collection pause times are the most significant delays any threads encounter.
sentences.chinese: 垃圾收集停頓時間是任何線程遇到的最顯著的延遲。

sentences.english: Cell suspension was collected, and then stained after hypotonic treatment.
sentences.chinese: 收集細胞懸液，再經低滲處理後滴片染色。

sentences.english: Alterna Professional Haircare uses caviar extract in its Caviar Anti-Aging collection.
sentences.chinese: 替代專業護髮品使用魚子醬提取的魚子醬抗衰老收集。

sentences.english: Or you can have a form to collect visitors' comments about your site.
sentences.chinese: 或者可以創建表格收集訪問者對網站的評論。

sentences.english: A dual-channel instantaneous soil radon measurement instrument based on the method of electrostatic collection is designed.
sentences.chinese: 設計一套基於靜電收集法的雙道瞬時土壤測氡儀。

sentences.english: For non-batch programs, stopping the collector forever is not an option.
sentences.chinese: 對於非批處理程序，永久停止收集器並非好的選擇。

sentences.english: Research your topic and learn as much background information as you can.
sentences.chinese: 研究你的選題，儘可能多的收集背景資料。

sentences.english: So the good spirit collected wood every night.
sentences.chinese: 於是這位善良的神仙每天晚上收集木柴。

sentences.english: With open shop for inheritance award-winning uncomplicated, full-time immersed collection.
sentences.chinese: 以開網店爲業的林強遊手好閒，全日沉浸收集。

sentences.english: Cooking water is recaptured to flush toilets, for instance.
sentences.chinese: 比如，廚房用水可收集起來沖洗廁所。

sentences.english: All three are stop-the-world copying collectors.
sentences.chinese: 所有這三種都是拷貝收集器。

sentences.english: Slip away to innocent days with this fantastically fun collection of jigsaws with a nostalgic theme.
sentences.chinese: 溜掉無辜天這個親密樂趣收集靈感與懷舊主題。

sentences.english: The Chinese gather intelligence differently from Western nations, Wise writes.
sentences.chinese: 懷斯寫道，中國收集情報的方法與西方國家不同。

sentences.english: Gathering them unemotionally will help those facts come out.
sentences.chinese: 非情緒化地收集事實會幫助那些事實浮出水面。

sentences.english: Analyze the information you've collected to identify patterns and insights.
sentences.chinese: 分析你收集的信息，來識別模式和見識。

sentences.english: But a collection of facts is no more a science than a heap of stones is a house.
sentences.chinese: 但收集的事實沒有更多的科學比礧是一個房子。

definition: to arrange/to tidy up/to sort out/to straighten out/to list systematically/to collate (data, files)/to pack (luggage)
to consult/to refer to/to look sth up in a reference source
reception (of transmitted signal)/to receive/to accept/to admit/to take over (e.g. a factory)/to expropriate
summary/to summarize/to collect (data, receipts etc)/to gather and report
to withdraw (money)/to collect (left luggage)/to extract/to refine
to keep/to preserve/extant/to remain (from the past)
to deposit/to store/to leave in sb's care
to conserve/to preserve/to keep/to save (a file etc) (computing)
to store up/to stockpile/(computer) to save/to store/memory/storage
